borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission Ref.2017/00203/FUL granted 21st March 2017 for the 'Erection of front and rear roof extension including an increase in ridge height, alterations to the rear fenestration, erection a replacement rear spiral staircase and insertion of a new bin/cycle store in the front garden area; Conversion of the first, second and third floors to form 1 x one bedroom and 2 x two bedroom self-contained residential (Class C3 use) flats'. The amendment is to revise the description of development as set out in the consented decision notice to remove reference to the location of the bin/cycle store. A condition attached to the planning permission securing the provision of waste and recycling storage as shown on the approved plans will be amended to also include reference to the cycle store. Revised description of development to read 'Erection of front and rear roof extension including an increase in ridge height, alterations to the rear fenestration, erection of a replacement rear spiral staircase and insertion of a new bin/cycle store; Conversion of the first, second and third floors to form 1 x one bedroom and 2 x two bedroom self-contained residential (Class C3 use) flats.
